summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of AI-powered multi-tenant school management system. Backend API testing achieved 100% success rate with all authentication, CRUD operations, AI integration, and multi-tenancy features working correctly. Frontend testing successfully validated user registration, login flows, Super Admin dashboard functionality, and school management features. AI Chat widget has minor UI interaction issues due to overlay interference from Emergent badge, but the backend AI API is fully functional.

ui_bugs.issue: Chat widget button not clickable due to Emergent badge overlay interference
ui_bugs.workaround: Can use force=True in automation, backend AI API works perfectly

passed_tests: ✅ All backend API endpoints (21/21 tests passed)
✅ User registration and authentication for all roles
✅ Super Admin dashboard loads and functions
✅ AI Chat backend API responds correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: AI Chat widget button is blocked by Emergent badge overlay. Consider adjusting z-index or positioning of chat button. All core functionality works perfectly - this is a cosmetic issue.
